markdown: The big sandwich is a family favorite for casual dinners. The kids often requested it when we
were going out for the evening.

ingredients.name: thinly sliced Swiss or Havarti cheese

markdown: 1. Slice the French loaf in half lengthwise, if the loaf is really thick, scoop out some of the bread middle.
2. Spread both sides liberally with mayo and as much mustard as you like.
3. Layer the ham, turkey, and cheese on the bottom half of the loaf.
4. Top with the tomatoes, salt and pepper to taste, onions and shredded lettuce.
5. Place the top of the loaf on and wrap the whole sandwich tightly in saran wrap. Refrigerate until ready to slice.
